data.description: Introduces the principles of sewn construction, fabric cutting/layout, and finishing techniques for creating garment prototypes as they relate to the design process. Develop foundational garment construction skills through a combination of demonstrations, hands-on studio work, and critiques. Emphasis is placed on mastering fundamental sewing techniques, and structural analysis to create well-constructed garments that integrate technical precision.
data.title: CRAFT & CONSTRUCTION FOR GARMENTS
